context_of_use: The customer initiates the checkout process to complete a purchase using multiple payment methods.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to choose the most convenient payment option
description: Complete the purchase by submitting the order and processing payment.
triggering_event: Customer decides to complete the purchase.
preconditions: Customer has selected products to purchase.
Customer is logged into their account.
assumptions: Customer has valid payment methods available for use.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to checkout using multiple payment methods.
main_flow: 1. Customer selects the checkout option → System displays the checkout page.
2. Customer selects a payment method → System processes the selected payment method.
3. Customer confirms the order → System submits the order and displays a confirmation message.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If payment processing fails, then the system displays an error message and prompts the customer to select a different payment method.
